attributes.action: Stop the ability to sue schools for injuries and accidents.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Either through a waiver system or as a compulsory condition for the school, children will take part in sports activities, which include the curently banned Netball "due to high insurance costs" and in sports days where it is deamed unfair to have a looser. Parents will NOT be able to sue the school in the event of an accident keeping the insurance costs down allowing these activities to continue.
